name: Superfetch Dog
description:
Superfetch Dog is a game of fetch where you play the dog! It's a platformer set in a lush forest that keeps getting more dangerous as your little master throws the mysterious orb into it again and again. But the orb is too important, you'll need to retrieve it for your little master before time runs out!

Run across various landscapes, avoid dangerous wildlife, jump over obstacles, climb trees, bark at small creatures, and learn new tricks to keep bringing the orb back! Nothing stops a good boy like Gale! 🐶

This is a short game with a little story element and a good ending if you manage to bring the orb back enough times. Playing this game to the good ending may take you anywhere between 30 minutes and 2 hours, though you may come back to it as a nice little platformer game with a relaxing soundtrack, or you may try to 100% the game's achievement for more play value!
